landing.title: Searching For A Real Estate Agent? Look No further
landing.text: If you are looking for a real estate agent or a project developer, then you are in the right place. With a lot of experience and the best possible prices we will get you the best deal possible.

wwd.title: Professional Real Estate Agents and Project Developers.
wwd.text: We are a company in the real estate industry with headquarters in Dresden. We are real estate agents & project developers and we will support you in the construction, renovation of buildings and selling existing properties. We bring a lot more expertise than traditional brokers, since we know all sides of the industry.

1.title: Jubefa Immobilien
1.text: Would you like to sell your property in a legally secure manner and at the best possible price?

2.title: Jubefa Constructions
2.text: Would you like to plan, renovate or build new with us? Look no further and contasct us!

sell.title: Do you have a property that you would like to get rid of quickly and easily?
sell.text: We exploit properties that no one wants to have anymore due to their condition, location or history. You can view us as a “recycling yard” for such properties and simply submit your property to us.

whyUs.title: Get The Best Deal Possible From Experienced Experts
whyUs.text: Being ahead of your competition is one of the most important things you need, in order to have a successful and thriving business. Our sales-driven approach will help your business rise above the others and ultimately get more leads.

1.title: Creative & Sales-driven Design
1.text: Our breathtaking and sales-driven design focuses on catching the visitors attention, leading to more potential customers and sales.

2.title: Persuasive Design & Typography
2.text: Our focus is having persuasive design and typography. These are essential to winning customer’s trust and getting more conversions.

3.title: Trust & Credibility
3.text: Our previous customers are very satisfied and we are sure you will be too. We are very flexible and gladly satisfy your needs and requests.

reviews.title: Here’s what our previous clients say about us

1.author: Roberto Hoppe
1.text: Herr Flade vermittelt Sicherheit und wirkt sehr engagiert. Für einen Makler ist er ziemlich bodenständig und sympathisch.Immer wieder eine große Freude mit im zu Arbeiten.

2.author: Silvio Gutwald
2.text: Wir können nur positiv von Jubefa GmbH berichten. Herr Flade hat sich von Anfang an als sehr engagiert und voller Tatendrang gezeigt. Mit klarem Konzept und sehr kompetent erledigte er seine Arbeit zur vollsten Zufriedenheit und wir würden sehr gern wieder auf Ihn zurückgreifen. Recht herzlichen Dank noch einmal.

3.author: Philipp Marschner
3.text: Professionelle und zügige Beratung. Mir wurde eine schnelle individuelle Lösung für meine Immobilie angeboten.

4.author: Dan Brä
4.text: Kompetente und zwangslose Beratung mit Herrn F., gerne wieder!

cta.title: Are you ready to profit from your property or get a new one?

imprint.title: JubefaGmbH · Imprint
imprint.intro: The Imprint page provides legal information about JubefaGmbH, including our company details and contact information. It is required by German law to have an Imprint page for companies operating in Germany.

points.5: Registration court: District Court of Dresden

Obligations to remove or block the use of information under the general Laws remain unaffected. However, liability in this regard is only applicable from the point in time at which Knowledge of a specific infringement possible. Upon notification of corresponding We will remove this content immediately if there is a violation of the law.
